title: Tower like structure - means a structure in which the height of the tower like portion is at least twice the width of the broader base
clause_text: Tower like structure - means a structure in which the height of the tower like portion is at least twice the width of the broader base.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
